errors.message: Azure virtual machine with Id (/subscriptions/d90d145a-4cdd-45a3-b2c4-971d69775278/resourceGroups/testRg1/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/testVm2) is with provisioning state 'failed'. To enable replication, VM's provisioning state should be 'succeeded'.
errors.possibleCauses: Virtual machine is not in desired state.
errors.recommendedAction:
Ensure that the VM's provisioning state is 'succeeded'.
      Refer to https://aka.ms/a2a-vm-state-issues to troubleshoot VM provisioning state issues.

errors.message: Azure virtual machine with Id (/subscriptions/d90d145a-4cdd-45a3-b2c4-971d69775278/resourceGroups/testRg1/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/testVm2) is with power status 'deallocated'. To enable replication, VM's power status should be 'running'.
errors.possibleCauses: Virtual machine is not in desired state.
errors.recommendedAction:
Ensure that the VM's power status is 'running'.
      You can check the power status in 'VM > Settings > Properties > Status' in Azure portal.
